name: MEMENTO MORE CAKE
description:
The only constants in life are death and cake. 

Roll your skull to collect cakes.
Press 1 for single player mode.
Press 2 for multiplayer mode. 
When round is over, press Escape to return to title.

Player one uses WASD. Player two uses arrows. 

Game by rogueNoodle and XenosNS.
Skull asset:https://www.assetstore.unity3d...
